A bottle cap garden: Turn an old bottle cap into a miniature garden by attaching soil and small plants to the top. This can be a fun and creative way to reuse bottle caps and add some greenery to your home or office.

A bottle cap bird feeder: Attach a string to an old bottle cap and fill it with birdseed. Hang it outside and watch as the birds come to feed. This can be a simple and easy way to attract birds to your yard.

A bottle cap art project: Use old bottle caps to create unique pieces of art. For example, you could paint or decorate the caps and use them as a collage or mosaic. This can be a fun and creative way to express yourself.

A bottle cap terrarium: Create a miniature ecosystem inside an old bottle cap by adding soil, rocks, and small plants. This can be a great way to learn about different types of plants and how they grow.
A bottle cap key holder: Attach a magnet to an old bottle cap and use it as a key holder. This can be a simple and easy way to keep your keys organized and easily accessible.
